name: Witches Get Witches
description:
"Find hot single witches in your area! Test your matchmaking capability tonight for single witches in your area! With this new cutting-edge storefront, you TOO can find love by uh testing your powers in this game you know what im tryna say"

- Katie, the world's premier, leading (and only) witch love doctor. Figure out what this is all about by downloading the hot debut game by SOFT DAGGER, made for TOJam 13 

SOFT DAGGER consists of programmers Kevin Kang, Keyi Zhou, and James Long. There's also the artists Phoebe Zhou and Lina Wu. Plus, Ethan Jiang helped us make the music. THANKS!!

UPDATE: fixed a bug where the horoscopes are wrong. Sorry!!
